____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''openCuratorInterface''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Open interface: <code>[[openCuratorInterface]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Close interface: <code>[[findDisplay]] 312 [[closeDisplay]] 2;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Detect if user used "Zeus" key to open curator interface in the absence of event handler for it: <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", {
	if ([[inputAction]] "CuratorInterface" > 0) [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Curator interface is open";
	};
	[[false]]
}];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
